name: Idle Fish Tycoon
description:
An easy and fun fish farming simulation game. Choose your favorite fish, feed it, after various changes, and eventually become the most beautiful one in the ocean!
Idle fish, simple operation, enjoy funny and relax sea world!
How to play:
Choose your favorite fish, feed them, collect the bubble they product.
By using the bubble you can unlock new fish, and feed them.
Slide the fish, they can product bubble faster.
Game Feature:
1.Simple operation, manage your fish easily.
2.Funny skill, feed fish by your hand, enjoy the fish chase your finger.
3.Multiple changes, from fry to son of ocean, every growth stage will give you new surprises.
